snippet: After a fatal stabbing, two families that had been neighbors for 30 years are asking why, and one member believes the motive may have something to do with a slice of pizza.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene; fatal stabbing in Brooklyn upends decades-long bond between the families of victim Michael Tillery and suspect Marvin Mann.
lead_paragraph: After a fatal stabbing, two families that had been neighbors for 30 years are asking why, and one member believes the motive may have something to do with a slice of pizza.

headline.seo: Families’ Bond Is Severed in a Spill of Blood
headline.main: Families’ Bond Is Severed as Blood Spills
